original_text: Then David was angry because the Lord’s wrath had broken out against Uzzah, and to this day that place is called Perez Uzzah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 웃사를 치시므로 다윗이 분하여 그 곳을 베레스웃사라 부르니 그 이름이 오늘까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: because the Lord's wrath had broken out
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주의 진노가 터져 나왔기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: that place is called Perez Uzzah
